National data (Type1)
This is the national produced statistics in the ROK that best corresponds to the definition of UN SDGs indicators.
Download the national metadata file for more information.
indicator_name: Unsentenced detainees as a proportion of overall prison population
indicator_definition: The total number of persons held in detention who have not yet been sentenced, as a percentage of the total number of persons held in detention, in a given period. 'Sentenced' refers to persons subject to criminal proceedings who have received a decision from a competent authority regarding their conviction or acquittal. For the purposes of the indicator, persons who have received a 'non-final' decision are considered to be 'sentenced'.
